title: Chris Rock Interview and More
itunes:title: Chris Rock Interview and More
description:
Wednesday 5/3- Today on the show we had comedian legend Chris Rock join us and him and DJ Envy squashed the rich people beef. Also Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day to Albert Breer because he didn't believe baseball player Adam Jones comments about experiencing racial slurs while playing in Boston. Also, Angela helped out some listeners during Ask Yee.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Wednesday 5/3- Today on the show we had comedian legend Chris Rock join us and him and DJ Envy squashed the rich people beef. Also Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day to Albert Breer because he didn't believe baseball player Adam Jones comments about experiencing racial slurs while playing in Boston. Also, Angela helped out some listeners during Ask Yee.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
